body.name: Natural Feelings Sports Bras for Women Removable Padded Yoga Tank Tops Sleeveless Fitness Workout Running Crop Tops
features: Padded sports bra with removable pads for convenient adjustment.
Made with high-quality nylon material with an added spandex elastic fiber which is thick but soft, sweat-wicking and not to shrink.
This sleeveless crop top is pullover designed with no clasps or hooks, well constructed and seamed to be durable.High neck for added coverage.
Yoga bra combine fashion, function and performance. Suitable for yoga, Pilates, fitness and any other types of exercises and workouts, or as the everyday bra.

Find your size options: X-Small(30C 30D 32A 32B 32C 34A),Small(32A 32B 32C 32D 32DD 34A 34B), Medium ( 34C 34D 34DD 36A 36B 36C), Large(34DDD 36C 36D 36DD 38B 38C), X-Large (36DDD 38D 38DD 40C 40D 42B).XX-Large(38DDD 40DD 42C 42D 44B 44C ).If you are between size or prefer loose feel,you can have one size up.

The Nudi Collection powered by a soft 80% Nylon, 20% Spandex fabric that completely fits your body and stretches with your free movement.It,s so weightless and buttery soft, all you feel is your practice.
Why We Love This? Previous page Next page

With full stability, elastic band and breathable mesh accents, you’ll love the freedom, comfort and support. Influencers & customers love this crop tops! This bra is always my go to and this is by far my favorite collection!!! This crop tank tops is quite cute for teen girls and fashion women ladies,feature with high neck,double line,cropped length,built in bra,solid,tight slim fit,basic style which is bloggers favorite. Light-to-medium support for studio & street Don't limit yourself to only wearing it at the gym! Tank tops with built in bra makes you more graceful and trendy whether you're going to gym or date nights. Plus, our sports bra is perfect for walking around cities, traveling, golfing, getting groceries, lounging around, or even meeting a friend for coffee. So lightweight you’ll forget you’re wearing it Just focus on your workout Say hello to this low-medium support yoga bra.Designed to make your workout more comfortable.This sweat-wicking bra gives you the coverage and support you need for yoga, run, and the gym—without restricting your movement or breath. The perfect look for your next gym wear! These Tank Tops For women are great for sports and gym Perfect for anything from a nighttime run to your morning yoga class.Stretching to hug your body,the fabric is soft-to-touch and quick-to-dry, allowing you to move without limits through any workout. More Colors And More Size Fit all body types and easy to match colorful leggings or bieker shorts We pay attention to consumer demands and provide variety of colors according to their preferences.In order to satisfy more body types, we listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort. Now we have the size of x-small,small,medium,large, x-Large,xx-large that can fit almost body types.
You're gonna to love this fabric absolutely!
All Day Comfy With Our Cute Workout Tops Previous page Next page
YOU ARE THE FOCUS! Previous page Next page Trust us, when you put this sexy sports bra tank on, you are the focus! Put our workout tops and have a fashion look now,go to the gym&hit the street!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh my gosh - LOVVVVVE!
reviews.reviewText: Folks, this top is perfection. And because I am sooo difficult to fit, my expectations were supremely low when ordered it. I was skeptical but ordered because I desperately needed a support bra-like shirt to wear under a too revealing tennis top. This top EXCEEDED my expectations.First, my measurements for context: BUST 34C; WAIST 29; HIPS 39. HEIGHT 6 feet. WEIGHT 152lbs. LEG INSEAM; 33.5 inches So, my torso is long because of my height.Yet, the MEDIUM is the perfect size to flatter me. It hits 2.5 inches above my belly button/where my rib cage ends in front (most likely would cover an average height person’s belly button) and does NOT ride up during vigorous arm movements straight up and to sides of my body.The beautiful stretch accommodates my broad back (wide lats from weight training) and the fabric is substantive without feeling too thick/heavy. Fits nicely beneath my formerly revealing tennis top. Not bulky.The breast pad inserts are strategically placed and offer terrific support for my C cup. It hugs and shapes me perfectly across the bust w/o creating a uni boob.Not sure if a bigger busted person wouldn’t feel constricted with the M but what I take up in length, you most likely could have extend over the bust.Bought the white - it’s the whitest, bright white with excellent arm pit hems that do not itch, collar that’s not tight, stretchy fabric that doesn’t ride up.It’s perfect. Just bought the black one!Go ahead. You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super great quality and made for bigger bust!
reviews.reviewText: I had a busy day wearing this too. I enjoyed it so much. Great quality, super soft and semi stretchy but still had compression. I am a 38d-40c/d bra size Large top 28-40” waist 5’5. The Xl fit perfect based off of the bra cup measurements. I definitely want more colors. The only con is I did have to adjust my boobs up from going under the band a tad but not a deal breaker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Workout out or Going Out
reviews.reviewText: I bought size S. Fit perfectly. I'm athletic (wider shoulders), 5'6", 119-125, Chest 34.5 inches, bust B but this would fit a C chest too.This has an inner cup. It looks and feels good, and eliminates the need for a bra or sports bra.I use in water sports (ocean paddling) and the gym.The colors are great. The brown is wonderful. The light purple/blue is way fainter than shown in the product photos but it is a very nice color and goes with everything... neutral. I think I've gotten black, brown, and the light purple. I love them all. They are also cute with jeans, shorts, skirts, and can be worn under super low cut tops/dresses, in order to be more modest if that is needed.These are a perfect gift. My young adult daughter likes these that I bought for her after I was super pleased with them for myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The colors are exact. And the fabric is definitely breathable and soft. It’s the perfect amount of compression. I initially purchased these for my spin classes, but now literally use them for everything. Perfect for gym or even just to lounge in. Love the material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit, Great Support
reviews.reviewText: For reference, I'm 5'5, 36D, 150 lbs, 41/29/42, and L fit perfectly. I love these because it can be worn as a top without a bra in the gym. I wash them on gentle and hang dry AND THE PADS STAY PUT! A miracle! I've got three colors so far. Def recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Loved this shirt so much I got it in multiple colors. It is great for working out and for everyday use. The built in bra is very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Review your item very carefully
reviews.reviewText: When I received my item, I thought I had that weird staining others had on the upper chest area. However, it turned out to just be some very, very mild wrinkling of the fabric that stuck until you wetted it a bit. I don't really know how to describe it or how it even happened since the wrinkles were imperceptible to the touch, but the dark lines it left were visible.Anyway, the item I received seemed very nice quality. There is no little logo on it like the pictures show with the white circle and cursive L. The fabric is pleasantly smooth (I don't really understand the "soft" description people use for these kinds of fabrics, which I've seen in the reviews — it's not soft really, just smooth; if you consider this "soft" you must be accustomed to some pretty rough fabrics!). The padding inserts are removeable. This is good for anyone who wants to ditch them, or people like me who always remove them before washing separately. I appreciate that there is stitching down the center to keep them separate, and the hole for the insert is reinforced but easy enough to use (I have more expensive clothes with the pad insert hole tearing because it is not reinforced or at least finished for some reason!). The material is comfortable. I can't see the padding under the shirt (not even an outline), but you might be able to on lighter colors like white. I've seen in some pictures that some people had rather harsh outlines of the inner bra's bottom elastic part showing through the top, but that wasn't the case for me. I bought this moreso for casual wear, but I think it would be good enough for at least a mild or moderate workout (depending on how much support you need; I can't speak much on that personally).The main caveat is I urge everyone to carefully review all the seams. The top I got arrived with one arm hole seam already popping. Although it was not completely loose thread/seam (was still very functional), this top being formfitting (and a nightmare to pull off due to the sports bra-esque shelf built in) means that you REALLY do not want broken stitching right out the gate. It will only get worse with time, slowly unravelling every time you stretch the shirt a bit to get it on/off. Agitation during washing would be a problem, and so would drying (if you use a dryer). I try to baby my clothing by air-drying most of it (planned to air dry this too) but the washer would still pose a problem. I have seen some people with pilling issues — I think you could probably use a fabric shaver with great success on this kind of fabric, and otherwise I'd turn it out while washing to minimize outer pilling.I have ordered a replacement because I really do like the top. If it comes without any quality problems then I will keep it in mind for ordering other colors as well (for now, the coffee brown is quite pretty!). I'd love to look into ivory or white, baby blue, rosemary green or grey olive, black, and maybe wine. Maybe even sunny coral but those light pinks often look bad on me (a shame since I love them!). It's very comfy. Depending on how you're built it might emphasize your armpit fat a bit. It doesn't dig in to make mine any worse, but it does happen to fall right at the line where I naturally keep a bit of fat (the curve between the top of your breast & the front of your armpit). So the fit doesn't emphasize it on me by squeezing it out per se, but the shape (which reveals that I have it in the first place) does draw a little bit of attention to it. I don't really mind this since that's just how I look regardless of the shirt, but others may, especially if it does dig in/squeeze on their anatomy. I would imagine it might chafe a bit if it dug in (I am not too sensitive to chafing though).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, buying more!
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'2", broad chest 34D, 30in waist and the medium fit completely fine!! I was looking for a high neck crop workout "buttery" tank and this is what I found! Wow, I love it. I'm literally working out in it right now. It's not TOO tight but supportive (I don't run so idk how it is running). It covers the side b00b fat also. It's cropped just above the belly button. It's so soft and I 10000% will be buying MORE!!!
Athletic 5'9" 150 lbs, 36B/medium build. Ordered a large. It's soft, comfortable and very fitted. I wouldn't have fit a smaller size.
Ordered a one size up and it was a mistake. Sizing is proper. Reviews about “fits small” aren’t true.
I usually wear small and sometimes medium. I ordered a large based on the comments. This shirt fits like a small. Size up!!
Looks great. Soft material. Plan on ordering in other colours.
